title: Google Integrations & AI Analysis
summary: Connect Google Analytics, Search Console, and PageSpeed Insights. Plus AI search readiness checks.

changes.title: Google Analytics 4 Integration
changes.description: OAuth connection to GA4. Sync sessions, pageviews, bounce rates, engagement metrics, and traffic sources for the last 30 days.

changes.title: Google Search Console Integration
changes.description: Sync search performance data: impressions, clicks, CTR, average position, and top queries per page.

changes.title: PageSpeed Insights Integration
changes.description: Batch fetch Core Web Vitals, performance scores, and optimization opportunities from Google PSI API.

changes.title: AI Search Readiness Analysis
changes.description: Analyze robots.txt for 13 AI crawlers: GPTBot, Google-Extended, ClaudeBot, Bytespider, and more. Get optimization recommendations.

changes.title: Crawl Comparison
changes.description: Side-by-side comparison of crawl results. Track improvements and regressions over time.

changes.title: Command Palette
changes.description: Press Cmd/Ctrl+K to quickly navigate views, run crawl commands, and search across the app.
